oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rutherford B. Hayes correspondence with John T. Wilder, 1881 September 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hayes, Rutherford Birchard, 1822-1893
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from President Rutherford B. Hayes declining John T. Wilder's invitation to join him in Chattanooga, Tennessee for a Civil War reunion organized by the Society of the Army of the Cumberland.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Veterans
Society of the Army of the Cumberland
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence and papers, 1865-1937
